heading: Our Story “From One Wedding... to a Thousand Memories”
paragraphs: Poornam wasn’t born in a boardroom. It began in the middle of marigolds, mehendi music, and the madness of our founder’s cousin’s wedding. what started as a one-time rescue mission in Indore turned into a lifelong passion -turning shaadis into art, chaos intochoreography, and budgets into beauty.
Today, we’re a team of planners, designers, crisis-managers, and dream-weavers who believe that every wedding is “once-in-a-lifetime,”not “one-size-fits-all.”
